snippet: Castro led the Chicago Cubs past the St. Louis Cardinals, 8-3, on Friday for their fourth straight win.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs defeat St Louis Cardinals, 8-3; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Castro led the Chicago Cubs past the St. Louis Cardinals, 8-3, on Friday for their fourth straight win.

headline.print_headline: Castro’s 2 Homers Help Cubs Top Cardinals
headline.main: Starlin Castro’s 2 Homers Help Cubs Top Cardinals
